author: rodzilla0621
content:
Hello Everyone, my name is Rodney. I'm a software engineer student from South Africa wrapping up my masters of information systems
I specialize in SQL database, Solidity and Python but i can read a lot of other code like Java and HTML 
I've been in the crypto space since 2017 and more technical since 2020 and I love every moment of it!!

I have attended some hackathon and boot camps sponsored by USC and Binance so if you need some resource or just want to chat, shot me a message or reply to this
Hope to engage with you all through this journeyüòÄ

author: partyman42069
content: Hi everyone! My last job was a Director of Engineering at a cloud based telephony company (so lots of great real time communications/async/state problems to solve). I am a full stack engineer, but am more focused on the front-end side of things. I missed the official cohort, but I am looking to be able to contribute and make an impact, so I will be following along with everyone throughout the process. I am super pumped to help and it is so great to meet everyone!

author: thogz
content: Im assuming it is unfortunately too late to join, isnt it? ;/

author: pipermerriam
content: <@!648600430426849289> we are no longer accepting applications, so that route of being funded for the program is closed, but the program is open and permissionless with no barries to participation, take a look at the `cohort-zero` repository (pinned in this channel) for more information.

author: derimagia
content: Good timing for me - I was actually just started a deep dive this week so this program is pretty valuable. Briefly saw the program yesterday and was bummed about the timing but I didn't know it was open like that so this is perfect.
